sentence.Network_en: The Protoceratops had a frill on its head. Males had a bigger frill than females.
sentence.Network_cn: 原角龙的头上长着个褶边一样的装饰, 雄性的比雌性的大些.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...   矮脚角龙(Breviceratops)   原角龙(Protoceratops)   巨嘴龙(Magnirostris)   越前龙(Echizensaurus)   蒙大拿角龙(Montanoce.
...e和角龙科Ceratopsidae)，原角龙科包括原角龙属（protoceratops）(Protoceratops)和纤角龙属(Leptoceratops, 即隐角龙属)；角龙科(Ceratopsidae)， …
原角龙英文名（Protoceratops）的含义是“第一张有角的脸” 简介原角龙的脑袋和躯干都很大。

auth_sentence.content: One particularly famous specimen preserves a Velociraptor locked in combat with a Protoceratops.
auth_sentence.res_content: One particularly famous specimen preserves a Velociraptor locked in combat with a Protoceratops.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One particularly famous specimen preserves a Velociraptor locked in combat with a Protoceratops.

auth_sentence.content: Protoceratops had a large neck frill which was likely used as a display site to impress other members of the species.
auth_sentence.res_content: Protoceratops had a large neck frill which was likely used as a display site to impress other members of the species.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Protoceratops had a large neck frill which was likely used as a display site to impress other members of the species.
